title: Dallas Mavericks: Read Mark Cuban's response to fan who wants to return Mavs season tickets due to Donald Trump criticism | SportsDay
text:
Now reading the latest in Mavericks News This story is about Mavericks Published 19h Read Mark Cuban's response to fan who wants to return Mavs season tickets due to Donald Trump criticism This Story is About... Comment on This Story Tom Fox/Staff Photographer Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban reacts to the play on the court in the second half against the Memphis Grizzlies at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Friday, December 18, 2015. The Mavs won 97-88. (Tom Fox/The Dallas Morning News) By SportsDayDFW.com Contact SportsDayDFW.com on Twitter: @SportsDayDFW 
Mavs owner Mark Cuban has been a constant critic of Donald Trump, even drawing a tweet from the president last week . When Trump took to the podium today for a press conference, Cuban took to Twitter to offer his criticism. 
That apparently didn't sit well with a Mavs fan who has season tickets, prompting an exchange between Cuban and himself: @RUDONIV_58 @FOX4 DM me and I'll help get it done
